abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column pens open letter to Daniel D Duffy, Freedom of Information Administrator at the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey; accuses authority of ducking request for phone logs of David Samson, former chairman and close ally of New Jersey Gov Chris Christie.
